AND A.DIARY_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND A.DRCT_MATTER LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT A.DIARY_ID , A.SCHDUL_ID , (SELECT SCHDUL_NM FROM COMTN_SCHDUL_INFO WHERE SCHDUL_ID = A.SCHDUL_ID) AS "schdulNm" , A.DIARY_PROGRSRT AS "diaryProcsPte" , A.DIARY_NM , A.DRCT_MATTER , A.PARTCLR_MATTER , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS "lastUpdusrPnttm" , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTN_DIARY_INFO A WHERE A.DIARY_ID = #{diaryId}
